newsitem.title: USA: Phoenix sees Q2 EPS $0.11 to $0.14.
newsitem.headline: Phoenix sees Q2 EPS $0.11 to $0.14.

text.p: Phoenix Technologies Ltd said Friday that it expects net income for the second quarter ending March 31 to be $0.11 and $0.14 per share based on nine percent more shares outstanding this year.
First Call estimates for the company were not immediately available, but the company said its year-ago second quarter results were $0.15 per share.
It also said revenues for the quarter are expected to be $18.8 million to $19.5 million, compared with $17.9 million for the 1996 quarter of 1996, but below analysts' estimates.
The company said it would report actual results April 17.
